review: We  consulted Dr.Shalini at Kasavanahalli as my daughter was having very high fever.  She had diagnosed and taken care of my daughter extremely well.  To be honest,  I was actually looking for such a doctor for a very long time.  Thank you Shalini madam

Booked a slot. No proper response from reception staff about appointment asked wait. On asking again they mentioned doctor is in traffic. After an hour only we could meet doctor. Childs situation worsened after that and the visit didn't help. Charged Covid administration fee though they don't anything at all additionally for that.
The doctor's behavior was a bit unfortunate. She seemed sarcastic and did not to believe us when explaining the symptoms.
